item.title: Character Creation
item.description: Screen for creating a Character. Currently has this parameters: Gender Skin color Hair style Hair color Eyes color Planning to add: Front hair style Rear hair style Beard Different color for each eye And name. But, that’s another story.

item.title: Character Shader
item.description: This shader takes (currently) 3 textures and blends them into one. Can set alpha of texture. Can make character a ghost using emission.

item.title: Start of the development
item.description: It’s time to start! To develop the game I use: Unity Visual Studio Paint.net For 3D models I will use ProBuilder.

item.title: Welcome!
item.description: This actually happened. I’ve created devlog for my game! My name is Morok (sometimes I use BroMandarin). I will post updates about game development on this blog. If you are interested, please read the about section and stay tuned for future posts!
